Name: Voxel Tanks
About the game: Voxel Tanks - dynamic top-down arena shooter with hardcore gameplay. Enemy tanks, battle mechs, landmines and freaking turrets - destroy them all before you get one deadly shot! Be fast and agile, avoiding enemy shells or try to be sneaky-tricky, shooting around the corner - its your warpath! Something you'll certainly find in this game: 20 various levels big deadly bosses voxel graphics chiptune music
Meta Title: Voxel Tanks: Jun 5, 2018, PigeonDev and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Voxel Tanks? Check out the release date (Jun 5, 2018), developer insights from PigeonDev, and a complete game summary.
